Hello blank fragment Información del usuario Nombre Apellido Correo electronico Contraseña Actualizar datos Actualizar contraseña DVA CARPIDORA 41 SL Carpidora 41 SL (Glyphosate). Non-selective and residual herbicide, broad spectrum, soluble concentrate (CS). Post-emergence application with actively growing weeds. Fragmento en desarrollo CHOIQUE 200 SL Choique 200 SL (Paraquat) non-selective herbicide in soluble concentrate. It attacks the green tissues of grasses or broad leaves without affecting the mature bark.
ENTRON 40 "ENTRON 40 SC is a systemic herbicide whose active ingredient is Mesotrione. It is an herbicide for the control of weeds in sugar cane crops. It is a herbicide with extensive broadleaf weed control. " LUFKEN NT LUFKEN nt is a selective and post-emergent hormonal herbicide for broadleaf weeds, it is recommended to apply in the following crops NANTLI EC Nantli EC (Amethrin + 2,4-D), selective herbicide in emulsifiable concentrate (EC). It is applied in early post-emergence on weeds 2-15 cm high. Registered against all kinds of weeds in sugar cane and corn. SANIYA 480 SL Saniya 480 SL (2,4-D), a highly systemic and selective hormonal herbicide against broad leaves in grass (poaceae) crops. Post-emergence application to actively growing weeds that absorb it through the foliage
